formal_name:
Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold:
The Fafnir Knight
description:
Experience a brand new story with a fixed party, voiced dialogue, and animated cutscenes in the new and incredible world of Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold: The Fafnir Knight.

Or, revisit the original Etrian Odyssey 2 with updated graphics and a full roster of classes.

Whichever path you choose, there will be exciting dungeons and frightening enemies!
name:
Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold:
The Fafnir Knight
